Board
public class Board
extends java.lang.Object

  • Method Details

    • fitsInside

      public boolean fitsInside​(Move m)
      Parameters:
      m - : move being evaluated
      Returns:
      true if the move is within the confines of the chess board, false otherwise

    • coordinateInside

      public boolean coordinateInside​(int row, int col)
      Parameters:
      row - : row position of the coordinate in question
      col - : col position of the coordinate in question
      Returns:
      whether the queried x,y position is within the confines

    • checkmate

      public boolean checkmate​(King k)
      Parameters:
      k - : king being evaluated
      Returns:
      true if king k is in checkmate, false otherwise

    • executeMove

      public boolean executeMove​(int pieceRank, int pieceFile, Move m)
      attempts to execute a move for a piece at position (pieceRank, pieceFile)
      Parameters:
      pieceRank - : rank of piece to be moved
      pieceFile - : File of piece to be moved
      m - : Move to be made on the piece
      Returns:
      true if the piece can be successfully moved to the position from m, false if not possible

    • isAPieceHere

      public boolean isAPieceHere​(int rank, int file)
      Parameters:
      rank - : rank of piece on chessboard
      file - : file of piece on chessboard
      Returns:
      true if there is a piece at this rank and file; false if no piece is located here
